biotools.summary:
Interactive visualization of copy number data from high-throughput sequencing.

Performing copy number analysis from targeted capture high-throughput sequencing has been a challenging task.

ReconCNV has been developed to overcome this challenge by providing interactive dashboard for hunting copy number variations (CNVs) from high-throughput sequencing data.

bioschemas.name: reconCNV
